casebody.data:
DIRECT COAST TO COAST, LLC and Selective Transportation Corporation, Plaintiffs-Petitioners,
v.
Joseph PETERSON, Individually and as an Agent of the Banfield Group, LLC, Defendant-Respondent,
and
Lisa Marie Harrison, Individually, and as an Agent of the Banfield Group, LLC and Jerry Ketel, Individually and as an Agent of the Banfield Group, LLC, Defendants. C-429 September Term 2017
079901 Supreme Court of New Jersey. December 13, 2017

To the Appellate Division, Superior Court:

A petition for certification of the judgment in A-001384-14 having been submitted to this Court, and the Court having considered the same;

It is ORDERED that the petition for certification is denied, with costs.
